about.headerDescription: Since 1946, Riosoto has been synonymous with ice cream in Central America.
about.storyP1: In 1946, a Salvadoran family decided to do something simple but important: create the best ice cream possible. Not the cheapest. Not the best-selling. The best.
about.storyP2: That was 80 years ago. And here we are, still doing the same thing.
about.storyP3: Today, Riosoto is more than a brand. It's a memory. It's the taste of your childhood. It's the ice cream your grandmother used to buy. It's what you ask for when you want something special. It's Central America in a spoon.

1946.title: An Obsession Is Born
1946.description: A passionate Salvadoran family founds Riosoto. Secret recipes. Real ingredients. An obsession with quality. A tradition that would last 80 years begins.

1960s.title: Grows Within Hearts
1960s.description: Riosoto becomes part of Salvadoran childhood. Schools. Celebrations. Special moments. The brand everyone knows.

1980s.title: Expands Across the Region
1980s.description: Riosoto crosses borders. Honduras. Guatemala. A flavor that connects all of Central America.

2000s.title: Innovation with Roots
2000s.description: We expanded to 30+ flavors. New presentations. But we kept what makes us special: quality, tradition, love for flavor.

2026.title: The Future Is Now
2026.description: Riosoto modernizes. We connect directly with you. Because after 80 years, we only want one thing: for you to keep enjoying our ice cream.

quality.title: Uncompromising Quality
quality.description: Every flavor is a promise. Real ingredients. Recipes perfected over 80 years. We never cut corners. Ever.

love.title: Love for Central America
love.description: We were born in El Salvador, but Central America is our home. We understand your culture, your market, your family. We're not a corporate company—we're yours.

innovation.title: Innovation with Tradition
innovation.description: We reinvent ourselves, but we never lose sight of what made us special. 30+ flavors. New presentations. But Riosoto's DNA remains the same.

moment.title: Your Special Moment
moment.description: Riosoto is accessible luxury. Your indulgence. Your reward. You deserve something good. It's that simple.

about.whyDescription: Because after 80 years, we know that quality and trust are priceless. We're not the trend of the moment. We're the tradition of your life.
about.ctaDescription: Find Riosoto at your nearest supermarket or distributor. If it's not there, ask for it. We want to be where you are.
